#summary Description PreferenceCategory

= Description =
`PreferenceCategory` represents a group of settings with a general heading. `PreferenceCategory` can not be included in `PreferenceCategory`, but can be included in PreferenceScreen. original description [http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/PreferenceCategory.html here].
= Attributes =
 * `key` - id settings, which can be used in other settings or in JavaScript (row), [http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:key original]
 * `title` - setting name (row), [http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:title original]
 * `enabled` - whether the setting is blocked or not (true/false),[http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:enabled original]
 * `shouldDisableView` - should the setting view be blocked or the setting itself is blocked (true/false),[http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:shouldDisableView original]
 * `selectable` - whether it can be selected by the user (true/false),[http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:selectable original]
 * `dependency` - dependency on another setting. A setting `key`, which the item depends on, must be specified here. If no value is specified in that setting, the setting will be disabled (string),[http://developer.android.com/reference/android/preference/Preference.html#attr_android:dependency original]

= Example =
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<PreferenceScreen>
        <PreferenceCategory
                title="First Category">
                <CheckBoxPreference
                        title="Checkbox Preference"
                        defaultValue="false"
                        summaryOn="This preference is true"
                        summaryOff="This preference is false"
                        key="checkboxPref" />
                <ListPreference
                        title="List Preference"
                        summary="This preference allows to select an item in a array|Choose some|Chosen {@s}"
                        key="listPref"
                        defaultValue="2"
                        entries="One|Two|Three"
                        entryValues="1|2|3 />
        </PreferenceCategory>
        <PreferenceCategory
                title="Second Category">
                <PreferenceScreen
                        key="SecondPrefScreen"
                        title="Second PreferenceScreen"
                        summary="This is a second PreferenceScreen">
                        <EditTextPreference
                                name="Another EditText Preference"
                                summary="This is a preference in the second PreferenceScreen|Empty|{@s}"
                                title="Edit text"
                                key="SecondEditTextPref" />
                </PreferenceScreen>
        </PreferenceCategory>
</PreferenceScreen>
}}}
